description: Developed and optimized web applications using React, ensuring responsive design and seamless user experiences.
Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, improving system performance by 25%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable full-stack solutions using MERN stack.
Analyzed large datasets using Python and SQL, delivering actionable insights that boosted sales by 15%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Designed intuitive user interfaces and improved user journeys, resulting in a 20% increase in engagement.
